conversation.text:
Based on your interest in the movie Heist, I understand that you're looking for a heist-themed film from around 2010, perhaps with Colin Hanks and Adam Shankman's involvement. However, since those specific stars and director aren't present in any of these options, I'll recommend some movies that fit your general criteria.

I think you might enjoy "Hesher" (2010), a dark comedy that shares some of Heist's offbeat humor and quirky characters. With Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Rainn Wilson as part of its talented cast, Hesher is sure to keep you engaged with its chaotic plot.

You liked the year 2010 and wanted Colin Hanks, but those aren't available in this list. With that in mind, I think "The Warrior's Way" (2010) might be an interesting choice - it's an action-packed film starring Dong-gun Jang, which doesn't quite fit the heist genre you mentioned initially, but still has a thrilling vibe to it.
